TopicTitle: Allow the delete key to delete the selected mission

Articles.Content:
In the mission room, I often want to delete a bunch of missions and it is a pain to have to move the mouse from one side of the screen to the other and back again over and over.

If I could select a mission and press delete to get rid of it that would speed things up no end.

Alternatively, putting the cancel mission button nearer the actual mission icon would help.
